typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		City as string,
		State as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> cityStateCountryPre
cityStateCountryPre aggregate(groupBy(City,
		State,
		Country),
	CityCount = count(City)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['CityStateCountry.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> cityStateCountry
